name: Minun
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

poke_power.name: Minus Charge
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if any Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent’s last turn, you may draw 2 cards. You can’t use more than 1 Minus Charge Poké-Power each turn. This power can’t be used if Minun is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Tag Play —
attacks.effect: If you have Plusle on your Bench, you may move an Energy card attached to Minun to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
